definition: an abstraction belonging to or characteristic of two entities or parts together
details:
noun
- an abstraction belonging to or characteristic of two entities or parts together
- (usually plural) mutual dealings or connections among persons or groups
= example: (usually plural) mutual dealings or connections among persons or groups
- the act of sexual procreation between a man and a woman
= synonyms: sexual intercourse, intercourse, sex act, copulation, coitus, coition, sexual congress, congress, sexual relation, carnal knowledge
- the principle that an act done at a later time is deemed by law to have occurred at an earlier time
= example: the principle that an act done at a later time is deemed by law to have occurred at an earlier time
= synonyms: relation back
- an act of narration
= example: an act of narration
= synonyms: telling, recounting
- a person related by blood or marriage
= synonyms: relative
